hero.title: Provider of Basic Needs Solutions & Local Economic Development
hero.intro: Premium Agribusiness, Trading of Consumption Needs, and Community Empowerment Partnerships
hero.about: CV. Boenhaz Makmur Utama is a specialist in the cultivation and supply of high-quality free-range chicken. We have modern farming systems with strict hygiene standards to ensure the best product quality.

pillars.title: Premium Agribusiness (Free-Range Chicken Farming)
pillars.description: We are the primary specialist in providing Original Free-Range Chicken (Ayam Kampung Asli) with Super Quality in various sizes. Our products are generated through farming practices that ensure high hygiene and the use of organic feed, guaranteeing premium, healthy, and optimally nutritious meat quality. We supply Frozen and Live Free-Range Chicken in large volumes.

pillars.title: Trading of Consumption Needs
pillars.description: We are engaged in the buying and selling of daily necessities for the community, covering primary and secondary consumer goods. Our main focus is on the distribution and provision of Cooking Oil to various market segments, ensuring the availability of quality products.

pillars.title: Partnership and Community Empowerment
pillars.description: CV. Boenha is committed to community empowerment through efforts to provide sustainable employment. We are also proactive in facilitating business partnership needs for other parties seeking synergy and strategic connections within our supply chain.

chicken_benefits.title: Benefits of Original Free-Range Chicken with Organic Feed
chicken_benefits.subtitle: Better Nutritional Composition

items.title: High Protein
items.description: Rich in animal protein for muscle growth and recovery

items.title: Lower Fat
items.description: Lower total fat content compared to conventional chicken

items.title: Lower Cholesterol
items.description: Lower cholesterol content for heart health

items.title: Rich in Iron
items.description: Important for red blood cell formation and energy

items.title: B Complex Vitamins
items.description: Good source of Vitamins B6 and B12 for optimal nerve function

items.title: Essential Minerals
items.description: Contains phosphorus and selenium for bone health and immunity

feed.title: About Our Feed
feed.description: We use high-quality natural feed that is guaranteed safe and healthy for the growth of free-range chickens. The feed used is specially processed to ensure optimal nutrition.

coop.title: About Our Coops
coop.description: Our cage system is well-designed, prioritizing air circulation, cleanliness, and the comfort of the chickens. The coops are cleaned routinely to maintain hygiene.

management.title: About Our Management
management.description: Our farm management is conducted by an experienced team with regular monitoring of the chickens' health and growth.

export.title: Export - Global Market Reach
export.description: Our target market extends to the premium and health-conscious segments at a global level. CV Boenha not only focuses on the domestic market, but we are also ready to deliver our Super Quality Original Free-Range Chicken (Ayam Kampung Asli) with organic feed to various countries that require a supply of premium poultry protein.

testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Customer satisfaction is our top priority

items.name: Budi Santoso
items.message: The free-range chicken from CV. Boenhaz is of excellent quality. Our customers are very satisfied with the taste and freshness of the product. The delivery service is also very responsive.

items.name: Siti Nurhaliza
items.message: Competitive prices and guaranteed quality. I have been a loyal customer of CV. Boenhaz for 2 years. Never disappointing.

items.name: Ahmad Wijaya
items.message: Reliable supplier for my business needs. Products are always fresh and quality. Their customer service team is friendly and professional.
